name: A Stitch Saves Nine
description: The Terran Empire has finally admitted the scope of their problems with temporal degeneration, and reaches out for aid. Can you convince their physicians that this isn't a weakness to be exploited?
rules:
-- Unique Terran Empire Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Saru, McCoy, Georgiou, Mirror Universe Crew or Courier Burnham will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Saru, McCoy, Georgiou, Mirror Universe, or Courier Burnham
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: McCoy
featured_crew.flavor: A doctor from the Mirror Universe, McCoy possesses all sorts of devices for torture and interrogation.

action.name: I Thought We Had An Agreement

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

next_threshold_rewards.name: Terran Empire Transmission
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

screens.text: "I will not let the empire I ruled so gloriously for so long fall to ignorance. If you persist in refusing to treat temporal degeneration, Doctor, it will be the least of your worries."
"Now I see what made Emperor Spock lose his drive: historical precedent. You've become weak, like everyone else afflicted with temporal degeneration. Let them die. More room for the true imperials."

"The empress... Philippa and I... we see a different future for the Empire. One that is all the stronger for its mercy. Doctor McCoy's convictions are madness. Countless will die. The Empire will fall. Please, help us convince him."
